data.message: Sorry for leaving a msg disregard to the original post as i just hope to drive attention from facebook team to solve my problem of incapability showing“on this day” in my FB, which i have already seeked for help millions time these several months....Could ur team kindly assist and help to fix the problem for me? Deeply appreciated.

replies.message: Hey Yasuf. You can access On This Day through the Explore section of your Facebook sidebar. You can also find it here: facebook.com/onthisday. Hope this helps! -Nick

Thanks You Developper♡ 
And Support Team.
